title: Not My First Errand
detail_text: <:th_ch0103/>Huh? Ruby-chan, what’s up?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Hello, Kanan-chan. My big sister told me to give you this…. Here<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Eeh!? You came here just for this!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>She said that she wanted to bring it herself, but something came up…. So she asked me to deliver it in her stead<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>I see. Thanks for going all the way here, Ruby-chan<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>It’s nothing! Ruby was free, so<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>….Are you also free after this?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Yeah<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Then could you come with me for a bit. Right now, I’m watching videos of other school idols for research, but there are so many, so I’m a little lost…. You’re an expert on it, right, Ruby-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>! Yeah, Ruby knows a lot! Let me show you a few of my recommended videos!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
